message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but the price is a little high for me. Would you consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $85. I can meet you in the middle, though!
I appreciate you working with me on the price.  How about we settle at $90 even?
I'm close to meeting you at $90, but I still need to make a bit more on this sale. How about we meet right in the middle at $91?
